/************************RECIPES************************/
    


recipe Put Lid on Large Tupperware Container
    {
    HCLargetuplid,
    HCLargetupbowl,
    Result:HCLargetup,
    Time:15,
    }

recipe Remove Lid from Large Tupperware Container
    {
    HCLargetup,
    Result:HCLargetupbowl,
    Time:15,
    OnCreate:recipe_hclargetuplid,
    }
